## Solicitation Details:

* The Department of National Defence (DND), under the Canadian Forces Health Services Group (CF H Svcs Gp), requires phlebotomy chairs for medical use in the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).
* Over the life of the contract, 1,060 units (the initial requirement) must be delivered to the Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED) by October 1, 2023. Optional requirements may be requested throughout the contract period, ending March 31, 2026.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate
